1182550.name: Garden Story: Autumn Town Demo
1182550.description:
Get a taste of what life is like as a helpful guardian grape! This demo is a vignette that showcases a concentrated slice of what the full version of Garden Story will have to offer when it releases.

Elderberry has left the restoration of Autumn Town in the capable hands of Concord, Fuji, and Rana. In this demo:

  • Wander Autumn Town: Autumn Town still has a few residents remaining, like Dillford and Ama. Find them and see how Concord can help.
  • Investigate the sewers: Seek out the mysteries within the sewers of Autumn Town, but be careful! Rumors of Rot mean it may be precarious….
  • Revive the Collection: Collecting resources will begin the Archive Restoration, restoring valuable information Fuji can use to build the community.
  • Get cozy: Let the sound of the rain and your own sense of time guide how quickly you’d like to take this journey. Explore at your own pace.
1182550.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
